> [[ Underground: Averron Observatory – Aetherforge // Neutral Territory // PVP Disabled ]]

One of the basement rooms has been converted to this place—a bridge leading to a large, circular platform, suspended over an abyss. Storage chests and bins are scattered around the platform. In the center, it slopes downward into a pit of purple flame that illuminates the whole of the room; floating a few feet above it is a partially-melted ingot, that the forgemaster—a levitating mess of armor and bandages suspended in raw energy—is working with.

“Are you a blacksmith?” You ask.

“No,” it says loudly, “I am much more.”

“This looks about the same as the last forge I saw.” You respond.

“You are correct, Keeper. Invest in me, then.” It makes a sound close to laughing. “Then, you will see.”

“What do you have for sale?” You ask.

“I deal in heavy armor, but can make weapons and light crafts if you provide adequate materials.”
